General.Name: Hindprakash Industries Limited
General.Description: Hindprakash Industries Limited manufactures and trades in dyes, auxiliaries, intermediates, and chemicals in India and internationally. The company offers acid, basic, and direct dyes. It also provides dyestuffs, such as disperse, as well as reactive, including bifunctional, vinyl sulphone, LX series, reactive high exhaust, and reactive hot brand dyes; dyes intermediates; dyeing and printing auxiliaries; pigments; textile chemicals and aux; water treatments solutions; and pharmaceuticals. The company was founded in 1942 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
